verbs.description: saavedra back in at hisd after raucous trustee meeting in [ARG1: a raucous school board meeting] [V: filled] [ARG2: with shouting and accusations lobbed by trustees against each other the houston independent school district board of trustees late thursday] replaced interim superintendent grenita lathan with former hisd superintendent abelardo saavedra the vote which followed a motion that most multiple board members said came as a surprise to them returns lathan to her previous role as chief academic officer the vote marks the third time the 214 000-student school district will have a new leader this calendar year the unexpected discussion came as trustees were about to decide whether to extend lathan contract through sept 30 2019 hisd superintendent houston independent school district school district 150 214000 student school district superintendent abelardo saavedra wanda adams richard carranza officer san antonio isd saavedra 214 000-student school district grenita lathan abelardo saavedra superintendent terry grier terry grier trustee

saavedra back in at hisd after raucous trustee meeting in a raucous school board meeting filled with [V: shouting] and accusations lobbed by trustees against each other the houston independent school district board of trustees late thursday replaced interim superintendent grenita lathan with former hisd superintendent abelardo saavedra the vote which followed a motion that most multiple board members said came as a surprise to them returns lathan to her previous role as chief academic officer the vote marks the third time the 214 000-student school district will have a new leader this calendar year the unexpected discussion came as trustees were about to decide whether to extend lathan contract through sept 30 2019 hisd superintendent houston independent school district school district 150 214000 student school district superintendent abelardo saavedra wanda adams richard carranza officer san antonio isd saavedra 214 000-student school district grenita lathan abelardo saavedra superintendent terry grier terry grier trustee
